context: Instacart saw explosive growth during the pandemic as grocery delivery demand surged. The company reached $35B valuation and became the dominant US grocery delivery platform.

competitors.name: Amazon Fresh
competitors.notes: Amazon's grocery delivery competing with Prime integration

competitors.name: Walmart Grocery
competitors.notes: Massive grocery retailer with pickup and delivery

competitors.name: Shipt (Target)
competitors.notes: Same-day delivery service owned by Target

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: Expanding from restaurants into grocery and convenience

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Food delivery platform adding grocery options

competitors.name: Peapod
competitors.notes: Early online grocery pioneer owned by Ahold Delhaize

competitors.name: Grocery Store Apps
competitors.notes: Kroger, Albertsons own delivery and pickup services
